DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: OpenCms taglib: EL functions
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: EL functions exposed by the OpenCms taglib

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Allows conversion of Long values to Dates. Can also handle Strings that represent a Long or a Date.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns a list of attribute values specified by the attribute name of the items of the given list.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Allows conversion of Objects to Locales. Can also handle Strings that are locales, or Locales itself.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Allows conversion of String values to CmsUUIDs. Can also handle byte[] that are CmsUUIDs, or CmsUUID itself.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Encodes a String in a way that is compatible with the JavaScript escape function.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the current OpenCms user context from the page context.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the size of the given list.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the link without parameters from a String that is formatted for a GET request.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the value of a parameter from a String that is formatted for a GET request.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Uses the 1st String as key to look up from the map that is passed as the 2nd String, and returns either the element found or the empty String. The map String must have the form key1:value1|key2:value2 etc.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Uses the 1st String as key to look up from the map that is passed as the 2nd String, and returns either the element found or the default value from the 3rd String. The map String must have the form key1:value1|key2:value2 etc.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Strips all HTML markup from the given input.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns a substring of the input, which isnâ€™t longer than the given int value.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Decodes a String in a way that is compatible with the JavaScript unescape function.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Provides simple access to a OpenCms JSP / EL content VFS access bean.
